summary: This document is an email chain from November 2019 regarding the loading of TD Bank financial records into the Relativity database for the Epstein case. It involves a Paralegal Specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York coordinating the upload of two TD Bank productions.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: Coordinates the loading of TD Bank financial records into the Relativity database for the Epstein case on behalf of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Receipt of TD Bank Productions
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office receives two TD Bank productions in the Epstein case.

events.title: Inquiry on Data Upload
events.description: An inquiry is made about whether the TD Bank data has been uploaded to the Relativity database.

events.title: Confirmation of Data Load
events.description: Confirmation is given that the TD Bank data has been loaded to Relativity for review.

keyFacts: Two TD Bank financial productions were received by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in the Epstein case.
The financial data was loaded into the Relativity database for review, indicating active financial investigation.
The email chain shows coordination within the prosecution team regarding evidence handling in late 2019.
The document references excluding cover letters or emails containing production passwords from the upload, highlighting data security protocols.
